On results, Vinci generated fee-related earnings of R$53.8 million or R$1.02 per share and adjusted distributable earnings of R$57.1 million or R$1.08 per share for the third quarter 2024. This stock often attracts value minded investors trying to decide if now is the moment to step in or top up.
